main event: A female observer reported seeing a round, bright object with a tail moving erratically in the sky on August 8, 1964.
interesting points: The object moved from west to east at a high rate of speed, then stopped momentarily., The observer watched the object for approximately 2 to 3 minutes., The object had no sound associated with it., There were no other witnesses to the sighting., The observer had not seen similar objects before.
sighted object: round, bright object with a tail
